headline: Zeem Solutions to build EV truck charging facility in Seattle Tacoma, thanks to grant funding from Northwest Seaport Alliance
summary: NWSA grant will also fund electric drayage trucks, and bring local truck operators into the project Paul Gioupis, CEO of Zeem Solutions Paul Gioupis, CEO of Zeem Solutions Ports of Seattle-Tacoma, photo credit: Northwest Seaport Alliance The Northwest Ports Clean Air Strategy is bolstered by the announcement of Zeem Solutions as the partner for the first electric truck project at the Ports of Seattle-Tacoma. Photo credit: Northwest Seaport Alliance EL SEGUNDO, Calif., July 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWI
